column7: From zero to 360 degrees in a flash  The IdeaPad Flex 5 is designed for you to keep your ideas flowing, anywhere, anytime with the ability to multi-mode your laptop and use it in ‘Laptop’ mode for everyday computing, ‘Tent’ mode for sharing things, ‘Stand’ mode for binge-watching, or ‘Tablet’ mode for more intuitive interaction.   Great performance   Proudly powered by up the AMD Ryzen 5 5000 series mobile processor with Radeon 7 graphics, the 14” Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 offers you excellent all around performance, graphics and more productivity in a flexible device built to be what you need it to be.  Wi-Fi 6  Enjoy a smoother wireless experience with Wi-Fi 6 (2x2) and Bluetooth 5.0 combo, all your connections are solid and up to 3x faster file transfer speeds than Wi-Fi 5.   Block intruders  Unrivaled security features include webcam privacy shutter & biometric fingerprint reader.The IdeaPad 5's webcam privacy shutter provides a physical barrier between your world and creepy hackers. With a fingerprint reader on the power button, you can set your IdeaPad to not wake up unless it detects your biometric signature.   Entertainment without limits  We designed the displays on the IdeaPad 5 laptop to pack as much screen space into the surface area as possible, pushing visuals to the edge and giving you a viewing experience that feels bigger. We call this active area ratio, or the amount of screen compared to the size of the surrounding borders, and the IdeaPad 5 has an incredible 90% active area ratio. With Dolby Audio speakers, what you hear will be as limitless as what you see.   A lot to choose from The IdeaPad 5 comes with a host of options including a USB-C port with power delivery to charge your devices right from your laptop, and Quick Charging to get your battery charged as quickly as possible.

column7: The 11.6" N22 Series 16GB Chromebook from Lenovo is designed for a Web-optimized experience and provides you with a balance of computing and mobility. Powered by a 1.6 GHz Intel Celeron N3050 dual-core processor and 4GB of LPDDR3 RAM, the N22 Chromebook can handle multitasking and everyday computing needs, such as checking emails, watching videos, and composing papers. If you need more processing power, the CPU can achieve a burst speed of 2.16 GHz. The N22 Chromebook has an 11.6 inch (1366 x 768) anti-reflective HD screen driven by integrated Intel HD Graphics. You can even output video using its HDMI port. For storing files and programs, it is equipped with 16GB of eMMC flash storage, a specification commonly seen on Chromebooks. When space runs low, you can attach additional storage options using its USB 3.0 port, USB 2.0 port, and microSD card slot. Connect to the Internet using 802.11ac WiFi and additional peripherals using Bluetooth 4.1 wireless technology. It also has a built-in 1MP webcam, microphone, and speakers for video chat capabilities as well as a single microphone/headphone combo jack. The installed operating system installed is Chrome OS.

column7: Gaming performance with no compromiseThe Legion 5 17 inch gaming laptop is built for the most demanding gaming and content creation workloads. Revolutionary AMD Ryzen 4000 H-Series Mobile Processors set the standard for performance in innovative, thin and light laptops. Enjoy an unprecedented increase in speed, responsiveness, and performance.GeForce Gaming.Incredibly fast, quiet performance. Real-time ray tracing and AI-enhanced graphics. And the mobility of the world’s thinnest and lightest designs. All powered by up to the NVIDIA Turing GPU architecture. It’s everything you want to game your best. And it’s only in GeForce gaming laptops.Fast refresh, deep colorsYou get to choose the options for its massive 17.3” FHD (1920 x 1080) IPS display—enhance your competitiveness with blazing, up-to-144Hz refresh rates or deepen your immersion through the visual pyrotechnics of Dolby Vision with up to 72% NTSC.Strike without fearPound away at your foes on the revolutionary Legion TrueStrike Keyboard. Forged from years of innovation, TrueStrike features 100% anti-ghosting for flawless precision and response times.Soft-landing switches with just 1.5mm key travel leverage a second-transition design to optimize your input experience and enhance control.  Brilliant white backlighting illuminates the keys so you can see what you’re doing no matter how late you game.Power & flowThe Legion 5 17 lets you challenge your foes wherever you go. All-day battery life, smart power management, and a slim adaptor that charges the battery from 0-50% in less than 30 minutes ready you for long sessions on the go.The audio edgeThe Legion 5's 2W Harman Kardon speaker system delivers powerful audio and deep bass. And the all-enveloping audio of Dolby Atmos headphone support lets you target sounds precisely from any direction.

What's more, it's ISV-certified with over 100 apps, and features an expansive selection of ports and displays. Powerful Processor Enhanced processors deliver the performance to increase productivity for your business. You can multitask quickly, move effortlessly between applications, and collaborate wirelessly in a high quality videoconference — all with the convenience of longer battery life. Plus, you can guard against identity theft and ensure safe access to your network with built-in security features. column7: ThinkPad X1 Yoga: Versatility to the Max Durable, Yet Ultrathin & Ultralight The full-sized, backlit keyboard - Black Color is spill-resistant and the keys retract automatically when not being used as a laptop, so they are not exposed when the keyboard is face-down on a desk or table. Plus, the X1 Yoga is tested against military specifications. Yet for all its durability, it weighs just 3.08 lbs / 1.4 kg. It also includes includes the ThinkPad Active Pen, a rechargeable pen that is dockable with the computer for charging. Dazzle Yourself & Others Dolby Vision high-dynamic-range [HDR] technology features WQHD 500 nits and 100% color gamut. As the first PC to include Dolby Vision, our new ThinkPad X1 HDR models deliver increased brightness, expanded contrast, amazingly accurate colors, and refined detail. Powerful Performance The new 8th generation Intel Quad Core CPUs boost performance 35% over the previous generation. Memory is even faster too with LPDDR3.  Extra Security The ThinkPad X1 Yoga includes robust security features, like ThinkShutter, which covers the front-facing HD webcam, and match-on-chip fingerprint readers with anti-spoofing technology that helps to safeguard company data while featuring a more secure way to authenticate log-in credentials. Plus, this Ultrabook includes Trusted Platform Module (dTPM 2.0). column7: REFINED FOR LIFE The Lenovo IdeaPad 5 brings you more for less, by blending performance, connectivity, entertainment, and affordability with a sleek design and feel, Dolby Audio, and AMD Ryzen 4000 series mobile processing with Radeon graphics.   MORE PRODUCTIVITY AMD Ryzen 4000 series mobile processors give you the performance to do more, from anywhere – faster than ever before.
